Message-ID: <88b151.21@company.com>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Dear Employee,
Your email mailbox is 95% full. Once it reaches capacity, you will not be able to receive new emails. Please visit the IT portal to increase your mailbox storage: http://company.com.it-support-portal.com/upgrade
If you have any questions, contact IT Support.
Thank you.

Netflix Support

label: phishing
eml:
From: Coinbase <no-reply@coinbase.com>
To: user@example.com
Subject: Alert: Unusual Activity on Your Crypto Wallet
Date: Sat, 22 May 2021 16:10:22 +0200
Message-ID: <c247fb.24@coinbase.com>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hello,
We have detected unusual activity on your Coinbase account. A login attempt was made from a new IP address. If this was not you, please secure your account immediately by resetting your password: https://coinbase.com.verify-login.com
If you recognize this activity, you can ignore this alert.
Sincerely,
Coinbase Security Team

label: phishing
eml:
From: FedEx To: user@example.com Subject: FedEx: Delivery Attempt Failed - Action Needed Date: Mon, 18 Apr 2022 16:46:07 +0800 Message-ID: <707166.25@fedex.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Dear Customer,

We attempted to deliver your package today but were unable to reach you. Please reschedule delivery and pay the outstanding fee to receive your package.

Thank you for choosing FedEx.
